slide.title: Document update modifiers: Single value manipulation

list.bullet: %*$set*% (sets a field to a new value)

slide.example:
<?php
$m = new Mongo;
$c = $m->demo->circus;
$c->remove();

$c->insert( array( '_id' => 'circ3', 'name' => 'Humberto', 'performers' => 12 ) );
$c->update( array( 'name' => 'Humberto' ), array( '$inc' => array( 'performers' => 4 ) ) );
var_dump( $c->findOne( array( 'name' => 'Humberto' ) ) );
?>
